title: @RiotRepertoir Anything about Mundo's Passive ?
body:
Since Garen's passive buff a while ago and the recent huge Warmog buff, Mundo's passive is ... bad ?

Warmog's passive is 10* Mundo's Passive, okay with the fact he still has it in fight but having 0.3% HP Regen in fight means only 12 HP gained per second with 4000 HP ... Huh ? Not really a strength nor a real identity ...

replies.body:
Don't have a ton of opinions other than it seems boring and could either use some sort of gameplay optimization (outside of just buying Health items).

"Your Health Regen is good" is a boring passive that we'd never put on a new champion nowadays, so it seems like a good candidate for change.

What about "damage taken over time increases your rate of Health Regeneration and base Attack Damage"?

Mundo is the Incredible Hulk inspired champion, so making him Hulk-like, as in DON'T MAKE THE MUNDO ANGRY, YOU WOULDN'T LIKE HIM WHEN HE GETS ANGRY would be good right?

The counter to this would be burst damage, healing reduction, etc. but being poked and kited would make him stronger

i dunno just something to think about

How about giving him Veigar's passive but with health regen? Have it only affect his natural health regen and not his ult, else he could regenerate 100% of his max health. 

And I don't believe this would be overpowered even if he reached 100 health per second. ADCs easily deal upward of 1500 DPS.

Maybe move his passive to a passive on his ult if he needs that health regen too.

Increasing his in-combat sustain would make sense thematically.
It's called "adrenalin rush," so why not make the health regen be stronger when in combat?
Well then it would be a better Garen passive. It would be way too similar.
kinda the opposite actually. huge difference between in combat regen and out of combat regen, and the two kits could do very different things with that kind of power.
Less similiar than they already are.
